sections.summary:
Dedicated team player with extensive knowledge of electrical engineering concepts and a creative aptitude for new product development.
Highlights
Seasoned Lab Expert : 12 years SEM,EDX, DIB and high
precision laboratory skills including X-Ray Analysis, Gas
Chromatography equip/techniques, High Purity Liquid Software Connoisseur: Upper level expertise in C++ , SQL, Verilog
Chromatography equip/techniques, Stress/Strain collection , VHDL, MatLab, PSpice, LTSpice, PowerWorld , LabView,
Expert in multiple lab equipment including but not limited to Windows 2000/XP, Web Design, MS Office (Excel, Project,
MicroPolisher, MicroCleaver, Goniometer, Oscilloscopes, PowerPoint and Word), and HTML programming.
Automated Function Generators, Power Supplys and
Multimeters
